nodes.text: "The Slaves of Zygerria" is a featurette appearing on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Four DVD set and focusing on the Zygerrian story arc of the fourth season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series.

The 22-minute-long feature is narrated by director Dave Filoni, writer Henry Gilroy and artist Kilian Plunkett and deals with the adaptation of Gilroy's Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic comic book series into episodes of the show.
